title: The art of being a synaesthete
author: Franc
body: The art of being a synaeshete is a short documentary about the hypothesis of a link between creative thinking and synesthesia, both as neurological condition and as inspiratory principle in the arts. The documentary explores the implications of synaesthesia as a condition, interviewing several experts in neuroscience and psycology, and looks into the ways it has instigated and inspired some methods of creative thinking and a particular aesthetics, and reviews some famous artists in history that declared experiencing synaesthetic perception. Buffalo, New York City, 2011.
